page.title: 13MAY DAY 1985
page.content: My name is James Bottomley and I go to Salterlee School, Shibden. On Monday the 6th May we had a holiday from school. In the morning I got up, got dressed and had my breakfast, then set off for Leeds University, to have a good time with some other children from our church. In the group I was the leader, Phil, played a 12 stringed guitar. We practised a play, then went for our dinner, but not in the dining room because it was packed, so we sat in our car. Then we explored the university. We saw a massive snake, and a lizard and some other reptiles. After we had watched my Mum sing in the choir we went home.
